news.title: An unlikely end to a 48-hour hunt for Kirk murder suspect
news.summary: "We got him," Utah Governor Spencer Cox said after authorities apprehended Tyler Robinson, the 22-year-old suspected of killing the conservative activist.

news.title: Nine Met Police officers suspended after BBC investigation
news.summary: The accusations include excessive use of force, discriminatory and misogynistic comments.

news.title: Labour MP says PM not up to the job, as Mandelson backlash grows
news.summary: No 10 say Peter Mandelson was sacked as the UK's ambassador after new information about his links to Jeffrey Epstein came to light.

news.title: As Russian army inches closer, Ukrainians must decide to stay or go
news.summary: In Bilozerske, eastern Ukraine, people must make the agonising decision to flee or risk staying.

news.title: Prince Harry told me I was being hacked, says Stephen Lawrence's mum
news.summary: Baroness Doreen Lawrence says she was "floored" by the allegation the Daily Mail was spying on her.

news.title: Anti-apartheid hero's new inquest should lead to justice, Biko family tells BBC
news.summary: Seen as a martyr in the struggle against white-minority rule, Steve Biko died in police custody in 1977.

news.title: Memphis next US city to see National Guard troops, Trump says
news.summary: The deployment of the National Guard to Memphis comes roughly a month after he sent troops to Washington DC.

news.title: Oxford Union president-elect condemned for Charlie Kirk comments
news.summary: Student George Abaraonye posted on social media after news of the shooting broke, seeming to welcome the attack, according to media reports.

news.title: Nepal gets first female PM after deadly unrest
news.summary: Former Supreme Court chief justice Sushila Karki is sworn in after a deal with protest leaders.

news.title: Court orders 'tribe' to be evicted from Scottish woodland
news.summary: A sheriff orders the three members of a self-styled "African tribe" to be removed from privately-owned land in the Scottish Borders.
